title: sys-clk-Editor
author: SunTheCourier
details:
Edit your sys-clk configuration!
The icon is mostly a placeholder, suggestions for a proper icon are appreciated!
changelog:
2.0.1

Improved writes to Configuration which show make it look much nicer :)
Updated Libraries

2

The app has been completely written thanks to @cathery (#18)
The app will now tell you when something is wrong wit sys-clk when you try to launch it
Controller inputs now act more like official Nintendo applications
Overall should be more stable
.elf file is only included for debugging purposes and as such is not needed on the SD to run the application

1.3

Updated to use libnx v3.0.0
Updated to support AMS v0.10.0 and greater

1.2.5

General Fixes

1.2.4

The name of the game is now put under the TID (in the section)

1.2.3

Fixed an edge case where if a title was improperly installed and has no name the editor would crash
Refactor lots of code, made error screens faster, etc
Compiled with latest LibNX for fw 9.0.0 compatibility
Names at the top of a section have been disabled due to a bug in the ini parser library

1.2.2

Changed the version correctly
Fixed an issue where file handles were not freed correctly

1.2.1

Added a proper Icon thanks to @cucholix
Removed unused code, should load 0.01x faster :P

1.2.0

Added comments from the sys-clk clock table (#8)
Changed RAM to MEM for consistency
Further improvements to overall application stability and other minor adjustments have been made to enhance the user experience.


1.1.1

Fixed application missing some configurations due to casing of letters in Title ID
Further improvements to overall application stability and other minor adjustments have been made to enhance the user experience.
